name: With the Wind (itch)
description:
With the Wind is a Puzzle platformer heavily inspired by Foddian games such as Jump King, Celeste, and Getting Over with It.  This project is an MVP to show the potential the project has as well as my potential as a game designer and programmer. The entirety of the project bar the following were created entirely by myself on my own.

World assets: https://vnitti.itch.io/taiga-asset-pack

Rope Swinging: Co developed with assistance theChief#0001 on discord together.

If you have any questions please feel free to ask!
